page.title: 09ODCOMBE PLAYGROUP
page.content: {Odcombe Playgroup}has been running since 1971. The most children we have had is 18.The numbers vary every year. The last two years we have been close to shutting down due to low numbers, but we survived now we have eleven children on the books. We are a committee run playgroup. The committee is made up from mothers (fathers) of playgroup children and also ones from the{Mother and Toddler group}that we also run. We have two sessions a week { Wednesdays and Fridays from 9:15am {till 12}noon. We provide milk and biscuits for the children.They must bring soft shoes and a towel, both named, in a shoe bag.We are a play group, not a play school, as none of the supervisors are teachers. All we teach them is to play and mix with other children.
